rows.label: tlk43300011_03_msg0001
rows.name:
News travels fast. Everyone round here
already knows the Hræsvelgr mercs lost
their leader.

rows.label: tlk43300011_03_msg0002
rows.name:
He was a legend in his own right,
to build up an elite squad like that
all by himself.

rows.label: tlk43300011_03_msg0003
rows.name:
My old man was always gushing with
praise for the guy.

rows.label: tlk43300011_03_msg0004
rows.name:
But now our shining star is gone.
I thought that'd be the end of the
Hræsvelgr mercs, but I was wrong.

rows.label: tlk43300011_03_msg0005
rows.name:
Looks like a buncha kids carried on
the tradition, so they're still going
strong.

rows.label: tlk43300011_03_msg0006
rows.name:
Still, it ain't gonna be easy keeping
it all ticking, even with all the old
works in place.

rows.label: tlk43300011_03_msg0007
rows.name:
You've gotta keep the squads busy,
and build up experience and trust or
the whole thing'll fall flat on its face.

rows.label: tlk43300011_03_msg0008
rows.name:
If they manage to actually pull it off
though? Then the mercs'll have
a bright future ahead of them.
